Container.Name: FogProject
Container.Overview:
FOG Project can capture, deploy, and manage Windows, Mac OSX, and various Linux distributions. Computers can be securely managed with FOG Project remotely, from anywhere in the world
FOG Project is completely free for commericial use. Support is completely free, and backed by our thriving forum community of over 30,000 users.
